name: WORLD DOG ALLIANCE-USA
description: Support canine wellness and awareness in the United States
sampleDescriptions: HR 6720, HR2 currently. Anticipated legislation regarding canine education/awareness domestically and internationally

HR 6720 Dog and Cat Meat Trade Prohibition Act of 2018
NR 2 Agriculture Improvement Act of 2018

HR 6720 Dog and Cat Meat Trade Prohibition Act of 2018
NR 2 Agriculture Improvement Act of 2018
Banning the dog meat trade in the USA and worldwide
World Dog Alliance's mission is to end the dog meat trade world wide. The ban in the US is part of that effort.
